name: WaitForKeptnEventTask
description: Wait for an answer of a Keptn event
author: Inetum-Realdolmen (Bert Van der Heyden)
helpMarkDown: Wait for an answer of a Keptn event

inputs.name: keptnApiEndpoint
inputs.label: Keptn API Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the Keptn API which is managed as a connectedService in AzureDevOps.

inputs.name: bridgeURL
inputs.label: URL of the Keptn Bridge
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL of the bridge including https://bridge.keptn.domain

inputs.name: waitForEventType
inputs.label: Wait for sequence finished
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of sequence to wait for

inputs.name: sequence
inputs.label: Sequence (when not evaluation or delivery)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the sequence to wait for finished

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Wait until timeout minutes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum amount of minutes to wait before timeout

inputs.name: keptnContextVar
inputs.label: KeptnContext variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline variable containing the keptnContext

inputs.name: markBuildOnError
inputs.label: Mark build as ... on result error from Keptn
inputs.helpMarkDown: What should happen when error state is returned by Keptn?

inputs.name: markBuildOnWarning
inputs.label: Mark build as ... on result warning from Keptn
inputs.helpMarkDown: What should happen when warning state is returned by Keptn?
